laboratory_examinations.findings: Indicated severe sensorimotor peripheral neuropathy with demyelination and axonal loss.
Indicated severe sensorimotor peripheral neuropathy with demyelination and axonal loss.
Showed a small amount of dermal amyloid deposition and extravasated red blood cells.
Showed extensive amyloid deposition throughout the submucosa, within peripheral nerve fibers and around minor salivary gland ducts.
Identified a heterozygous missense mutation of the TTR gene at c.210T>A (p.Ser70Arg).
